Text: CLAIM: Protestors tear gassed just for Trump's "photo-op" walk to church.VERDICT: MOSTLY FALSE. Protesters outside WH were cleared ahead of D.C.'s 7 PM curfew announced earlier in the day.Is there any real ; honest news reporting anymore?https://t.co/BGbzYJrjCv

We need the BAME report on COVID-19 now. We need to ensure ALL MPs can vote safely today. We need Boris Johnson to condemn Donald Trump in the strongest possible terms regardless of where this leaves a trade agreement. These 3 things are all absolutely crucial today
Trump is invoking the 1807 Insurrection Act to send federal troops to US cities.  We are about to live in a militarized America if this is allowed to happen.
